Jaina.name: Frostbolt
Jaina.description: Deal 190 (+4% per level) damage and Chill the target.

Jaina.name: Blizzard
Jaina.description: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

Jaina.name: Cone of Cold
Jaina.description: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage and Chill targets.

Jaina.name: Summon Water Elemental
Jaina.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

Jaina.name: Ring of Frost
Jaina.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

Jaina.name: Frostbite
Jaina.description: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, Slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her Abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Quest: Deal 15,000 Ability damage to Chilled Heroes. Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block Ability, allowing Jaina to become temporarily Invulnerable.

1.name: Fingers of Frost
1.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.description: Increases the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.description: Increases the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

7.name: Ice Floes
7.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 2.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 seconds per use.

7.name: Ice Lance
7.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

7.name: Icefury Wand
7.description: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 75% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 1 second.

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.description: When Jaina does increased damage from Frostbite, she is shielded for 25% of the total damage dealt. This Shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.description: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge three times as fast and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.description: Increases the cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Cone of Cold also roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

16.name: Snowstorm
16.description: Increases the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduce its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Deep Chill
20.description: Frostbite's Chill can now stacks a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

20.name: Ice Blink
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.
